about_the_game:
Transform your music into an immersive experience with Rhythm Any Music! Tap into the beat of your favorite tunes and watch as the game automatically generates stunning backgrounds that sync perfectly with the rhythm. With the ability to import music files in various formats, including Wav, Mp3, Ogg or Flac, you'll be able to play along to any genre of music, from classical to hip hop.
Challenge yourself to score points with each hit as you tap to the beat of the music. And if you need an extra boost, activate the Music Power feature to triple your scores!

Find your rhythm!


With an environment that reacts to your music, and the option to play using your keyboard or any USB-based plug and play controller, Rhythm Any Music is the perfect game for music lovers and gamers alike. Get ready to find your rhythm and bring your music to life!
Whether you're looking for a relaxing way to unwind or a challenging game that tests your skills, Rhythm Any Music is the perfect game for you. So put on your headphones, choose your favorite tracks, and get ready to find your rhythm! With easy-to-use controls and endless possibilities, Rhythm Any Music will keep you tapping to the beat for hours on end.

Features


  • Tap to the rhythm of your favorite tunes and score points with every hit!
  • Import your music files in various formats, including Wav, Mp3, Ogg or Flac, and watch as notes are automatically generated to match the beat.
  • Activate the Music Power feature to triple your scores and dominate the game!
  • Experience an immersive environment that reacts to your music and generates stunning backgrounds that sync perfectly with the rhythm.

name: Rhythm Any Music

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10 Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT 1GB / AMD HD 4870 1GB (DX 10, 10.1, 11)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 924 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10 Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 CPU 3.70GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB / AMD HD7870 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 924 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 10 compatible

short_description: Immerse yourself in the beat of your favorite tunes with Rhythm Any Music! Score points, and watch as the game generates stunning backgrounds that sync perfectly with the rhythm. Get ready to unleash the power of your music and find your rhythm!
